hackathon-description-text: Join us June 13-15 in NYC or ONLINE and show your dev and design skills... Build video experiences using Kaltura, and win twice - Participating teams will get a chance to visit Kaltura Connect and present their applications to leading media companies, universities, educational organizations and Fortune 500 corporations around the world.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: IBM Distinguished Engineer and CTO of IBM Cloud Services
Author of The Art of Immersion

hackathon-eligibility: Specific rules may be announced at the event.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: For the finalist app of choice that have leveraged Kaltura and the VoiceBase API !
Goes to the finalist app that leveraged Kaltura and Rackspace!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Admission to Rackspace Startup Program: $24,000 in Hosting Credits

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How original is the idea? Is it simply a repackaging of a previous project or is it something that has never been done before? Mixing of projects to form new concepts? etc.
Does it feel like a quickly hacked-together project, or something that is well thought out? From the User Experience to how many bugs...
Does it look good, and does it feel good to use?
How many of the participating APIs and SDKs have you blended? Is your app creatively leverages the APIs to create great experiences?
Which apps get the most votes?

hackathon-description-header: Bring on your App dev and design skills, build a video application, present it to 1,200 attendees and win $50,000 prize!
